basic_information.scholarship_name: Joshua Jarrett Scholarship for Energy Ethics
basic_information.college_name: College of Fine Arts and Design

description: To provide scholarships for UCO students. Eligibility Requirements Must read the book "The Moral Case for Fossil Fuels" by Alex Epstein and write an essay on any part or all of the book This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
